entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning near noon then changing to flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
